comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
+1

We even had jackrabbit-jcr-tests targeting Java 5 earlier, but had to switch back to 1.4 before Jackrabbit 2.0 (see JCR-2100) so the TCK could be used to test possible Java 1.4 implementations of JSR 283. AFAIUI no future JCR version will target Java 1.4 anymore, so switching to Java 5 is quite OK. I've removed the Hudson/Jenkins build from JCR-2100.

description: This restriction only exist because these tests form the TCK for JSR-283 which needed to support JDK 1.4. If maintenance on the JSR-283 TCK is needed, it can happen in a previous branch (2.3?).
